ygData.subject: Re: Bard Hate...
ygData.msgSnippet: Everyone all over EQ (on this list, other lists, websites, in the game...) claim to know how things like this work...  We have just seen contradictory posts
ygData.messageBody:
Everyone all over EQ (on this list, other lists, websites, in the game...)
claim to "know" how things like this work... We have just seen
contradictory posts here. Only people who have access to the EQ source code
could really answer that question (you could say design document - but
considering the bugs we know about....)

All we have is theories based on observation - and who knows how much the
dreaded random number generator affects this? Perhaps it's the playing of
songs. Other theories - high charisma. Low Hit points...

I would guess that at times Class is a factor. I've seen messages from Mobs
lately - I forget the exact wording - but to the affect that "I hate bards
like you..." So in this case - I would say bard hate does exist.
Otherwise - your guess is as good as mine!

Slyde of Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: <galen@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 10:18 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Hate...


> From: galen@...
>
> I have been hearing rumors that "bard hate" does not really exist...
Anyone actually have proof that it does?
>
